about_the_game:
Inspired by classic fighters from the '90s, KONSUI FIGHTER is a hand-drawn fighting game that puts you in control of ten unique fighters, each representing an aspect of Ayumu's personality as he struggles to wake from a deep coma. Featuring an original story as well as classic arcade, versus, and training modes, KONSUI FIGHTER provides a variety of ways to put your skills to the test!

A FORMIDABLE FOE

Utilizing the power of Circean Studios' own Aeaea Engine, KONSUI FIGHTER debuts with the groundbreaking FORESCORE AI system. CPU fighters will look into the future, forecasting and scoring the predicted outcome of the various actions they can take, enabling them to quickly defend against - or take advantage of your unique fighting style.

THE TOURNAMENT OF THE MIND BEGINS

Trapped within a deep coma, professor Ayumu Tsuburaya struggles to regain his memory of the events that led to his condition. Searching his inner mind, the characters that make up the fabric of his personality emerge, thrust into conflict as their world falls into ruin by an unseen force. Will Ayumu's mind regain order, or will it remain forever lost in chaos?

KONSUI FIGHTER features an original story across nine chapters, each depicted with beautiful hand-drawn illustrations. Learn the secrets of Ayumu's past and take control of each character as they stuggle to save their world from destruction in KONSUI FIGHTER's story mode!

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS

Take on your friends in local network or online versus modes, built from the ground-up with rollback netcode to provide a solid multiplayer experience! KONSUI FIGHTER also features a couch co-op versus mode to go head-to-head with your friends on a shared system.

PLAY ANYWHERE

Aeaea Engine's cross-platform support enables KONSUI FIGHTER to be played on a variety of platforms, including Windows, macOS, Linux, as well as native support for Steam Deck. Enjoy cross-platform multiplayer with your friends via local network and online versus modes across these and the mobile editions of KONSUI FIGHTER!
